name: Vending Machine Surprise 2 - Fun Simulator
description:
Vending Machine Surprise 2 is a free, fun vending machine simulator where you can collect lots of different cool items.

No need to travel to your local supermarket or grocery store to use vending machines when you have your very own in your pocket.

From Ice cream, smoothie drinks, toys, apples, lollipops, to fidget spinners, can you collect them all!

Enter a code of the item you want then put in your coins then claw up your prize, winner!!

Vending Machine Surprise is part of the Surprise series including the toy egg surprise games.

Vending Machine Surprise is totally free and is a great game for kids of all ages!
This is the full app.
